Steps to reproduce it are:
- close all editors
- close Properties view if open
- open a schema file (e.g. org.eclipse.ui/schema/editors.exsd)
- double-click on the id attribute under the editor element
- in the Properties view, select the kind property
- drop down the combo for it
- select a different value
- drop down the combo again
- click on a different view or the editor
Fixed in HEAD for 3.1 on April 13, 2005.
